images.title: 위상 반전 마스크(PSM) 간섭 원리
images.description: 이진 마스크 vs 위상 반전 마스크(PSM)의 빛 투과 비교. PSM에서 0°와 180° 위상의 빛이 경계에서 상쇄 간섭하여 패턴 경계가 선명해지는 원리.

spec.prompt: A technical educational diagram comparing binary mask and phase-shift mask (PSM) in photolithography. Top row: Binary Mask shows opaque chrome bars and transparent quartz regions, with the resulting light intensity profile below showing broad, rounded peaks with poor contrast at boundaries. Bottom row: Phase-Shift Mask (Alternating PSM) shows alternating 0° and 180° phase regions between chrome bars, with the resulting light amplitude showing opposite polarity waves that destructively interfere at pattern boundaries, creating sharp zeros. The final intensity profile shows much sharper, well-defined peaks. Labels indicate '0° phase', '180° phase', 'destructive interference at boundary', 'improved resolution'. Clean physics diagram style with wave illustrations.
